Summary: Thirteen to sixteen objects moving and hovering, continually changing direction . No aircraft militarily or otherwise in vicinity. i
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tel Mond
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife was walking the dogs. 23:55. along our street when she looked up and noticed a number of moving star like objects in the southern sky. she quickly came inside and notified me. i got my binoculars and observed them going to and fro constantly changing directions. i counted between 13\16 of them. we observed them for about ninety minutes and then went to bed. i had seen one or two of ufo's many years previously. we both found the observation very exciting. because it reconfirmed our belief of other inter planetary life.
